original_text:
And he brought them to his holy land,
    to the mountain which his right hand had won.
korean_text: 그들을 그의 성소의 영역 곧 그의 오른손으로 만드신 산으로 인도하시고

sentences.original_text: And he brought them to his holy land,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 그의 거룩한 땅으로 인도하였고,

sentences.original_text: which his right hand had won.
